metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5360 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
HAproxy 1.6.x before 1.6.6, when a deny comes from a reqdeny rule, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (uninitialized memory access and crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via unknown vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

haproxy - 1.6.3-1ubuntu0.1
vim-haproxy - 1.6.3-1ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: haproxy package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.3-1ubuntu0.1').
